name: SecurePrivacyTVConsent
summary: An SDK for managing user consent in tvOS apps, ensuring compliance with privacy regulations.
description: The Secure Privacy Consent Management SDK enables developers to manage user consent seamlessly, ensuring compliance with privacy regulations while giving users control over their data preferences.
